p:
In line with Boland (2019) and Macpherson (2017), we hypothesized that
FYMS know the anticipated consequences of global climate change (e.g., climate change leads to an increased number of infectious diseases) and that
FYMS see their individual responsibility in tackling climate change (i.e., are aware that climate change is man-made and that everyone should do something about it) but that in line with Macpherson (2017),
FYMS probably don´t see a professional responsibility in tackling climate change in their role as physicians (e.g., having an informational role for one´s patients with regard to climate change).
